description: What are the chances of a Normal (Technical) or Normal (Academic) stream student making it to a local university? Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: End of streaming in schools: Will it help more students make it to poly and university?
title_page: End of streaming in schools: Will it help more students make it to poly and university? | The Straits Times
maintext:
What are the chances of a Normal (Technical) or Normal (Academic) stream student making it to a local university?
Not too good, going by the figures released by the Education Ministry (MOE) in Parliament last year in response to Member of Parliament Louis Ng.
